//0: KaiHeiLa english constants by Yellowsink for KaiHax
//1: based off of their english constants, but much cleaned up and with missing keys
remove_friend_description: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}} from your friends list?
not_online_friend: You have no friends online, go and call them to play!
not_pending_friend_requested: You have no pending friend requests.
require_username_identify: You need a username and tag to add a friend
check_username_identify: Check that the username is spelled correctly
emoji_manage_description: Here you can add your favorite server emoji to the emoji bar.
drag_modify_emoji_order: Drag to modify the order of emoji
guild_not_emoji: The guild has not uploaded any emoji
want_use_emoji: Want to use emoijs in all servers?
buy_vip_use_emoji: Buy BUFF to use any emoji and unlock other perks
per_month_price: Unlock perks for as little as ¥19.9 per month
buy_vip_can_unlock_permission: BUFF can unlock many perks covering text & voice chat, and more, improving your experience
add_buff_make_it_more_interesting: Add BUFF to the chat to make it more fun
not_found_bill: Can't find bill? Submit a ticket
bill_tips:
1. The system will charge after successful payment, and will recharge automatically within 24 hours if the charge fails.
2. If online banking duplicates payments, or the order is cancelled after payment, the refund will be processed in 15 working days.
exchange_vip_please_input_cdkey: Redeeming a gift? Please enter the code below:
login_mobilepla: Please enter your cell phone number
login_docstr: Click the Register/Login button to agree to the {%lTerms of Service} and {%lPrivacy Policy}.
login_docstr_m: I have read and agree to the {%l Kaiheila User Agreement} and {%l Privacy Policy}
server_mutestr: Muting a server will turn off all notifs except for @mentions
sever_allrolesw: Turn off @mention notifications for all roles
voice_joinstr_m: Its quiet in here. Are you alone? Hurry up and call your friends to Kaiheila!
voice_qualitystr: Please rate your experience, we will improve to provide a better service
voice_swmcmodestr: Should change channel mode to host mode
voice_swfreedommodestr: Should change channel mode to free mode
voice_mcnullstr: Uhh ~ no one is currently speaking, if you want to speak, please click the mic
voice_mcapplytip: Long press to ask to speak
diagnosis_domlinestr: You are currently using a domestic voice line, do you want to switch to an overseas accelerated line?
diagnosis_intllinestr: You are currently using an overseas accelerated line, do you want to switch to a domestic voice line?
accompany_nosourcestr: There is no music source, please run a music player first and try again.
tuning_talkstr: Please speak into the microphone for detection.
tuning_micinputstr: The current microphone has sound input, if no sound is heard, it will go to output device detection.
tuning_reportlab: A voice exception report has been generated for you.
tuning_micoostitle: No voice input detected, your voice input device is broken
tuning_reasonstr: The device is not working also for the following reasons.
tuning_turnonmichl: {%l2. The computer microphone is not enabled.}
tuning_antivirushl: {%l3. Kaiheila is disabled by security software.}
tuning_micsubmithl: If all checks are still not resolved, you can {%lsubmit a support ticket}
tuning_suggeststr: If others still can't hear your voice, suggest they do voice detection in their settings.
ai_aitip: AI noise reduction - eliminate background noise and keep only your voice.
ai_aidetstr: AI Noise Reduction eliminates background noise and keeps your human voice! Try it out!
message_enterstr: Press enter to send a message
message_nopermissionpla: You do not have permission to send messages in this channel
printscreen_deftip: Screenshot (not yet set) Hold Shift and click to hide the window
printscreen_settip: Screenshot (%s) Shift-click to hide the window
message_tipstr: You can't chat here yet, you must join the server before you can start interacting
message_atauthonlinestr: Mention all online members who have permission to view this channel
message_atauthallstr: Mention all members who have permission to view this channel
message_atauthrolestr: Notify role members who have permission to view this channel.
message_atauthrolestr_m: Mention this channel's members with this role
message_remitstr: Slow mode is on, but you are immune!
message_sendpla: Click to send message, Enter key to line feed
message_escstr: Esc to cancel, Enter to save
upload_releasestr: Dragging in a file? Drop to upload!
_fraudhl: Please beware of scams in chat, click to learn how to prevent scams
channel_invstr: Invite all your friends in one click.
channel_qrcodestr: Scan the QR code to download the Kaiheila App to chat with your friends anytime, anywhere.
channel_questionstr: Have an issue? View the help pages or get in touch with us.
invite_sharelinkstr: Share this invite link and your friends can join by clicking it
invite_linktimestr1: Your link will expire after %s%s1, or after using %s2 times.
invite_linktimestr3: Your link will expire after using %s%s times.
severoverview_idstr: Make your server public, and other users can join the server directly through discovery.
severoverview_defchanstr: All server invites will go to the default text channel
severoverview_welcomechanstr: When someone joins, this channel will receive a random welcome message.
severoverview_cdstr: You can change the recommended server information after 7 days
severoverview_recommendedapplystr: Find friends and join the list of recommended servers to find more members!
severoverview_recommendstr_m: Please see to the web page for recommended server settings.
severoverview_coverstr: PNGs are supported with suggested minimum 1024x600, suggested aspect ratio of 5:3, and max image size of 5MB.
severoverview_defnotistr: This decides if users without notification settings set will be notified of every message in this server
severoverview_intldomitem: Domestic and foreign interconnection dedicated line
severoverview_areaswstr: Switching server region will restart all voice channels. This takes about 1 second.
boost_notifystr: Boost to your favorite servers and unlock up to 6 ranks. Higher ranks grant all members of the server perks. Go boost your favorite servers now!
boost_boosternumstr: You can see booster status here, including the number of booster packs.
boost_gracestr: *You will keep your level until the end of the buffer period of three days.
roles_orderstr: The ranking in the member list can be changed by dragging and dropping. Users' color will be the highest role they have.
roles_distgshsw: Show members of this role separately from regular online members
roles_atnoticestr: Note: Members with the "Mention @all members, @here and all roles" permission can bypass this restriction.
roles_adminstr: Having this permission gives you full administrative rights, including bypassing all other permissions (including channel permissions). In short, you can do everything except delete the server, which is high-risk.
roles_mgrstr: Members with this permission can modify server name, avatar and region, as well as unspecified profile setting items, and set server security.
roles_mgrlogstr: Members with this permission can view the administrative logs of the server.
roles_linkstr: Members with this permission can create invitation links.
roles_invstr: Members with this permission can manage server invitations.
roles_chanstr: Members with this permission can create new channels and edit or delete existing channels (and groups).
roles_remstr: Members with this permission can remove other members.
roles_blackliststr: Members with this permission can ban other members and view the ban list.
roles_cusstkrstr: Members with this permission can manage custom emojis.
roles_chgnamestr: Users with this permission can change their nicknames.
roles_chgothnmstr: Users with this permission can change other people's nicknames.
roles_authmagstr: Members with this permission can create new roles and edit/delete roles that are lower than that role.
roles_checkchanstr: Members with this permission can view text and voice channels.
roles_wordauthstr: Members with this permission can send messages in the text channel.
roles_msgmagstr: Members with this permission can delete messages sent by other members and top messages.
roles_uploadstr: Members with this permission can upload files (including images).
roles_atallstr: Members with this permission can use @all, @here to mention all members in the channel, this permission can bypass the "Allow anyone to @mention this role" restriction.
roles_reactstr: Members with this permission can add new responses to messages.
roles_vocconnectstr: Members with this permission can connect to the voice channel.
roles_vocpsvstr: Members with this permission can passively invite or be moved to the voice channel when they do not have voice connection permission.
roles_speakstr: Members with this permission can speak in the voice channel.
roles_acpmntstr: Members with this permission can play background music in the voice channel.
roles_vocmagstr: Members with this permission can modify channel speech mode, manage channel members on mic, transfer channel members to other channels and kick them out of the channel.
roles_serdeafenstr: Members with this permission can restrict the ability of other members to listen.
roles_sermutestr: Members with this permission can restrict other members' ability to speak and play music.
roles_vocactstr: Members without this permission must use push-to-talk to speak in the channel.
roles_createstr_m: Use roles to organise your members and set their permissions. You can also assign perms on the members page.
emoji_sktuploadstr: Emojis %s for members to use within this server. Emoji names include only Chinese, English, numbers and at least two characters, max emoji filesize 512KB.
log_logmagstr: Records administrative actions performed within the server
log_edgrpauthstr: Edit the group override permission settings for %s
log_addgrpauthstr: Add group override permission settings for %s
log_edchanauthstr: Edit the channel override permission settings for %s
log_remchanauthstr: Remove the channel override setting for %s
log_hcchgtostr: Number of people changed from {%b%s} to {%b%s1}
widget_invlinkstr: If a channel has been selected, the widget will generate an invitation link.
widget_premadestr: Please embed this HTML code into your website to use the Kaiheila widget.
security_riskstr: Restrict members' actions in the server by setting rules, thus reducing the risk within the server. Members can be unrestricted by being given roles. {%l for detailed instructions}
security_prohibitstr: In-server %s members, within join server %s, forbid %s.
security_edittip: (Click on the blue area to edit)
invite_invrecallstr: Here all available invitation links, you can revoke any one of them.
bans_blackliststr: We currently use accounts to restrict users.
bans_noblockuserstr: No one has been blacklisted, which is good. But again, not so good in a sense.
bans_noblockuser2str: Please don't be soft if you need to be.
account_bannerstr: Support uploading PNG, GIF images, recommended size 628x250px, image size no more than 5MB.
account_namechgcdstr:
90 day interval for each username change for normal users
BUFF users get a 10 day interval for each username change
account_confirmtip: Are you sure you want to remove the banner?
account_namecdstr: You wont be able to change your name again for %s days, are you sure you want to change to "%s1"?
account_namecdstr_m: Days until next username change: %s days
account_namecdtip: BUFF shortens the username change cooldown
account_verifcodetitle: Step 1 - Verify the original phone number
account_movepla: Please press and hold the slider and drag to the far right
account_alreadyinusestr: The cell phone number has been registered
account_sendcodestr: Send a verification code to the phone number %s
account_pwlimitpla: 6-30 digits in English, numbers and symbols, not pure numbers
account_wechatconfstr: Are you sure you want to unlink your WeChat account?
account_qqconfstr: Are you sure you want to unlink your Tencent QQ account
account_cxlnoticestr: We are sorry to hear that you want to leave Kaiheila. To ensure your account safety, before you submit a deletion request, you must also meet the following criteria.
account_safetysitulab: The account is in a safe state
account_safetysitustr: High risk accounts cannot be deleted. The account must not have been changed within seven days and there is no risk of theft.
account_normsitulab: The account is in normal use
account_normsitustr: There is no violation of the account operation. Accounts within the penalty period cannot be cancelled.
account_noserlab: The account does not own any of the servers
account_noserstr: Server owners cannot be deleted. Please make sure you no longer own any of the servers before deleting your account. You may transfer your ownership or delete your servers.
account_nobotlab: Account does not own any of the bots
account_nobotstr: It is not possible to logout when you own bots. Please delete all your bots in the development center.
privacy_settingstr: Here you can change your settings for your privacy
privacy_sermsgsw: Allow server members to PM you
privacy_sersittingapplystr: This setting will be applied when you join a server. It does not apply to your existing servers.
privacy_addfriendlab: Who can add you as a friend
privacy_uxsw: Participate in the UX Improvement Program
privacy_uxstr: Allow us to track your usage to help us improve our service for you.
privacy_agreementstr: Click to view the Kaiheila {%l Software License and Service Agreement} and {%l Privacy Policy}
authorized_authappstr: This shows the authorized apps, you can delete them at any time.
invite_invstr: This is where you keep track of the people who have been invited by you to join Kaiheila
invite_invcodeinputpla: Please enter the invitation code/invitation link, which cannot be changed after confirmation.
invite_invlinkregstr: The number of new users who have successfully registered through your link will be tracked. Below is the total number of users you have invited.
invite_invbuttonstr: 2. Click the Invite button to generate a link
invite_copylinkstr: 3. Copy the link and send it to your friend
buff_endsstr:
You're enjoying the BUFF perks
%s expire
buff_equitystr: Unlock more benefits for as little as $19.90 per month!
buff_bannerstr: Customized background image, support GIF format
buff_gifportraitstr: Interesting animated avatar, make your profile less boring
buff_crosssersktstr: Get rid of server restrictions and use more emojis.
buff_higeruploadlimitstr: Support uploading up to 100MB files, now you can share more joy!
buff_intlvocstr: No setup needed, automatically accelerate overseas voice connection!
buff_uniquestr: Exclusive BUFF badge to show your support
buff_timestr: A single month BUFF is valid for 30 days from the BUFF opening date.
buff_renewstr: If you renew the BUFF within the BUFF validity period, the BUFF validity period will be accumulated from your current BUFF expiration time backward, accumulating to your BUFF validity period by 30 days/month.
buff_paymentstr: BUFF payment methods are currently only available: WeChat payment and Alipay. Don't make private chat transactions, the official staff will not take the initiative to ask for money.
buff_giftstr: The gifted user needs to be friends with the gifting user. The BUFF is effective for the gifted user immediately after the gift is successfully given.
buff_buffstr: Add BUFF to the chat to make it more interesting.
boost_booststr: Each booster pack is valid for 30 days and can unlock up to 6 server levels. As the server level increases, all members of the server can enjoy more rights and benefits. Go boost your favorite server!
boost_uniqueidentitystr: A unique identification in the member list.
boost_badgestr: A shiny badge in your profile panel.
boost_uniquerolestr: Exclusive role in the booster server.
boost_moresersktstr: More server emojis can be uploaded.
boost_highersizelimstr: Increased upload limit for the entire server.
boost_pricestr: The server booster package is only ￥20/each, and you can enjoy 30% discount for opening BUFF, and you can launch a booster for the server you have joined.
boost_durationstr: Boost Pack is valid for 30 days after recharge
boost_selectnumstr: Choose the number of booster packs
boost_succstr: You have successfully boosted %s server %s1 times.
billing_reportbtn: {%l Can't find a bill? Submit a support ticket}
billing_triduumbuffstr: Three days of the Kaiheila BUFF
billing_tipsstr:
1. The system will automatically recharge after successful payment, and will automatically recharge within 24 hours if the recharge fails.
2. If the Internet banking duplicate payment or the order is cancelled after payment and the recharge is not successful, the Internet banking refund will arrive within 15 working days.
cdk_giftcardstr: Want to redeem a gift? Please enter the code below:.
cdk_shortcdkstr: Code should contain at least 18 characters.
cdk_longcdkstr: Code can only contain up to 36 characters.
voice_autosyssw: Automatic selection of system recommended settings
voice_autosysstr: When this setting is turned on, the device change prompt will no longer pop up when the computer device is changed.
voice_aidescstr: Allows you to erase the background sound from the microphone and keep only the speaking voice.
voice_exceedstr: Voices above this threshold will be automatically recognized and transmitted
voice_aistr: Noise cancellation is not available when microphone AI noise reduction is on.
keybinds_hotkeystr: Here you can change the shortcut key setting of Kaiheila.
keybinds_mouseustr: (mouse settings are not supported at this time)
emoji_stklovestr: Here you can add your favorite server emoji to the emoji bar.
emoji_dragorderstr: Drag and drop to modify the order of emojis
overlay_descpstr: Here you can overview the in-game overlay settings
overlay_explstr: To let you enjoy the thrill of the game without the distraction of recognizing your friends' voices. We will display the user who is talking in the top left corner of your screen while you are playing.
overlay_clicklocastr: Click to change the overlay position
notificatios_desktopstr: Desktop alert pops up in the notification center when you receive a mention (@) message, and you can turn it off with a switch.
notificatios_inboxstr: Blink the avatar in the taskbar when there is a new notification.
notificatios_phonenotilab: Phone notification settings when logging in on desktop side
notificatios_fiveminitem: Phone receives notifications after 5 minutes of not operating the computer
notificatios_tenminitem: Receive notifications after 10 minutes of inactivity
notificatios_fifteenitem: Receive notifications after 15 minutes of inactivity
notificatios_neveritem: Cell phone does not receive notifications
tool_desstr: Here you can find the tools provided by Kaiheila, and you can set them
tool_livestr: If you have any other questions or suggestions, please go to the "#OBS Feedback and Suggestions" channel in the {%l Kaihiela Center} to give feedback to the staff.
obs_fullbtn: Click on the full screen to see the effect
obs_urlstr: After completing the panel configuration, enter the following URL in the browser source, width and height:.
obs_fontstr: The font package needs to be loaded in advance, so please wait for a while if the font style is not displayed.
advanced_devstr: Developers can write and manage bots in this mode in a more portable way.
status_playstr: What are you playing right now?!
status_gamesw: Show game dynamics in personal status
status_musicsw: Show music dynamics in personal status
status_playingstr: In the middle of a game
windows_autostartstr: When this option is turned on, Kaiheila is automatically started when the game is turned on
windows_minimizestr: If this option is enabled, we will hide to tray after boot up. We will come back out when you need it.
windows_traystr: When this option is turned on, the program will be minimized to the tray when you click the close button in the upper right corner.
windows_dxvastr: Turning on hardware acceleration will make Kaiheila run more smoothly. Please turn off this feature if the game is experiencing frame drops. (Translator's note: this breaks KH on Linux)
update_updatestr: Record our growth steps, also record everyone's expectations for us
quit_quitstr: Are you sure you want to log out?
textoverview_lowstr: Unless members have channel management or message management privileges, the frequency they send messages, needs to be greater than the interval time.
textoverview_savestr: You change... But if you insist...
roles_categchangestr: The current channel role permissions have changed and are no longer synchronized with {%b%s} permissions.
channeldel_delstr: Are you sure you want to delete %s? All the contents that already exist will disappear, and the operation cannot be undone!
voiceoverview_maxlab: Maximum number of people on the channel
password_formatpla: Please input password, password only support 1~12 digits
copy_channelnametitle: The channel password is incorrect in %s
copy_copystr: The newly created channel and %s are exactly the same in terms of permission setting, bit rate and capacity.
createserver_createstr: Create a new server and invite your friends to join, it's free!
createserver_joinstr1: Enter an instant invite and join your buddy's server.
createserver_tplstr: A server is like a room where you can chat and play with your friends, so create a server and invite your friends to join!
createserver_freedombtn: I want to create a server freely
createserver_gmrolestr: The administrator has all the rights to manage the channel and can do everything except delete the server.
createserver_textgmstr: Text channel administrator can manage messages in the text channel.
createserver_voicegmstr: Voice channel administrator can manage voice members.
createserver_createserverstr: Create a topic server of interest and you can chat with your friends by voice/text for free
joinserver_jointitle2: Enter an instant invitation or server ID below to join an existing server. The invitation link and server ID will look something like this.
joinserver_jointitle2_m: The invitation link and server ID will look something like this.
joinserver_idinputpla: Enter instant invite link or server ID
sever_leavestr: Are you sure you want to leave %s? You wont be able to read any messages unless you are re-invited
feedback_desstr: If you encounter problems while using Kaiheila, you can choose one of the ways to solve them.
feedback_feedbackstr_m: Create your support ticket, we will reply as soon as possible
feedback_troubledespla: Please put the details of the problem here, enter at least five characters
feedback_advisepla: Please write a detailed description of the suggestion here, enter at least five characters
feedback_deserror: Please enter at least five characters for the description
message_topdefaultstr: This channel does not have any top messages yet
friends_noawaitingstr: There are no pending friend requests here.
friends_emptyflstr: Uh... There are no friends yet.
friends_emptyblstr: There is no one in the blocked list.
friends_noonlinestr: You have no friends online at this time, so go get them to play!
friends_confirmstr: Are you sure you want to remove %s from your friends list?
friends_msgtopstr: Here is the beginning of your private message history with %s.
friends_fourofourstr: Although accidents don't happen often, they always do.
friends_serinvsentstr: You sent an invitation to join a server (%s)
friends_serinvacceptstr: You have been invited to join a server (%s)
friends_reasontitle: Please select the reason for reporting
friends_personalinfostr: Will not disclose your personal information
discover_interestpla: Enter the game you are interested in
discover_promotestr: Let more people find your server
featured_recomsertitle: Apply to become a referral server
featured_avgonlinestr: 2. Average daily online time of members for 3 consecutive days
featured_aggrementstr: 3. Please read and comply with the {%l Community Guidelines}
featured_notestr: Note: If the server members <50 or the average online time for five consecutive days <30 minutes, the recommendation will be cancelled.
featured_serclasstip: This classification option will not affect the server display
featured_serbannerstr: Click to upload the server cover image
featured_serdescstr: Click to add server description, control between 10-40 characters.
featured_guildnametip: Please write the name of the guild team, the main game you play, and the purpose of the server's role (recruitment requirements).
featured_inputnametagstr: Please enter the game name and classification, staff will review it within one working day
featured_nullnamestr: The game name cannot be empty.
featured_inonebusstr: Staff will review within one working day
featured_onebusawaitstr: Please wait patiently for manual review, it will take about 1 working day
download_qriosstr: Scan the code to download the iOS client
download_qrandroidstr: Scan code to download Android client
friends_blockstr_m: View blocked users or unblock them
friends_nullblockstr_m: There is no one in the blocked list
friends_searchpla_m: Search for friends and private messages

message_searchpla_m: Search for a user or role
voice_ballstr_m: See who is speaking while using other apps and also perform quick actions
voice_allowfloatingwindowitem_m: Allow hover window to be displayed
voice_balldenied_m: Unenabled permission will cause the hoverball to not work properly.
voice_disabletouchscreensw_m: Put your face on the screen
privacy_photostr_m: Set avatar, send pictures and videos in the channel, etc.
privacy_camerastr_m: Functions such as sending pictures or videos after shooting
privacy_locationstr_m: Automatic setting of server area and other functions.
privacy_systemstr_m: Only authorized system privileges can be queried
voice_wyyrestarstr: When you pick Netflix cloud music as the music source, Kaiheila needs to restart it
voice_nodevicestr: Unable to find your mic {%lclick here for help}.
privacy_agreementupdate1title: User agreement and privacy agreement updates
privacy_agreementupdate1str: Thank you for trusting and using Kaihiela! We have updated the {%l "Kaihiela Voice Software License Agreement"} and {%l "Kaihiela Privacy Policy"} according to the latest laws, regulations and policies, please read them carefully. If you agree, please click "Agree" to use our products and services, and we will do our best to protect your personal information according to the law.
privacy_agreementupdate2str: Thank you for trusting and using Kaihiela! We have updated the {%l "Kaihiela Voice Software License Agreement"} according to the latest laws, regulations and policies, please read it carefully. If you agree, please click "Agree" to use our products and services, and we will do our best to protect your personal information according to the law.
privacy_agreementupdate3str: Thank you for trusting and using Kaihiela! We have updated the {%l "Kaihiela Privacy Policy"} according to the latest laws, regulations and policies, please read it carefully. If you agree, please click "Agree" to use our products and services, and we will do our best to protect your personal information according to the law.

channel_syncpermissionstr_m: Are the permissions of %s adjusted to be in sync with %s1?
